welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Satellite Beach, the charming seaside city known for its breathtaking beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful community has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Melbourne International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is dedicated to domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for international flights and some domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merritt Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used for domestic flights and offers a smaller, more intimate airport experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
